attributes.action: Repay all expences claimed by Members of Parliment that are considered unacceptable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Repay in full unacceptable expences as deemed by the rules applied to members of the Public claimbed by members of parliment. 
To be investigated by the Inland Revenue and the Police and if needs be Punishable in accordance with the Law ie Fraud

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
